description: Lance just loves playing with Sadie. Her quick wit and love of a good punishment is a unique combination, and one that Lance truly appreciates. It's a little like the old cat and mouse game. Whenever Sadie see an opportunity to get away with something, she gives it a try, much to Lance's amusement. But at the end of day, Sadie still gets exactly what she deserves, or is that desires.
title: I Like it When it Hurts
